title: How to get out of Safe Mode on a phone - Quora

response.answer_text: Getting out of safe mode is quite simple but first, what is safe mode?. Safe mode is android pones recovery mode, it comes about when the phone cannot complete boot normaly, this may be due to corrupted files so the phone only loads the necessary apps to allow the user to back up their data incase the phone crashes completely. If your phone starts in safe mode on its own then it is highly recommended that you exit safe mode after backing up your data . Finally, to exit safe mode just reboot your phone and you are good to go. If safe mode persists then you will have to reset your phone and this means losing all your data that you havent backed up.

Turning off safe mode is easy but I would not recomend it at first. Ill tell you how but first you have to know the importance of safe mode, safe mode is the phones recovery mode,. It is meant to help android users to backup their important data incase the phone crashes completely. It means that the phone may not start normally. If the phone automaticaly starts in safe mode then it is highly recommended that you dont exit safe mode immediately before creating a back up. To exit safe mode all you have to do is shut down your phone and then turn it on again. If nothing is wrong with the phone it will start normaly. If it persists then reset your phone.
